casebody.data:
Murfield, Guardian, Appellee, v. State Farm Insurance Company, Appellant.

[Cite as Murfield v. State Farm Ins. Co. (1986), 22 Ohio St. 3d 54.]

(No. 85-985 Decided February 5, 1986.) Wolske & Blue, Walter J. Wolske, Jr. and Gerald S. Leeseberg, for ap-pellee. Hamilton, Kramer, Myers & Cheek, Chornies N. Myers, Jr., Emerson Cheek III and James R. Gallagher, for appellant.

This cause on appeal from the court of appeals (case No. 84-CA-30) is reversed on authority of Hedrick v. Motorists Mut. Ins. Co. (1986), 22 Ohio St. 3d 42, decided this day.

Locher, Holmes, Douglas and Wright, JJ., concur. Celebrezze, C.J., Sweeney and C. Brown, JJ., dissent.
